---
layout: entry
title: "OP-oo"
shortdef: "Other opinion"
subregister_of: Opinion
---

- Text expressing the writer's or writers' opinion that are not [Reviews](OP-rv), [Opinion blogs](OP-ob), [Denominational religious blogs / sermons](OP-rs), or [Advice](OP-av)

<!-- details -->
